subject: Track and Field
Records and Achievements
lead_paragraph: Mo Farah broke the championship record in winning the 3,000 meters at the European Indoors in Turin, Italy. Fabrizio Donato set the meet record in winning the triple jump.
snippet: Mo Farah broke the championship record in winning the 3,000 meters at the European Indoors in Turin, Italy. Fabrizio Donato set the meet record in winning the triple jump.
